device.errorAccountAccess: No access to account. Check your account and enter a new password in device settings.
device.errorAccountAccessNotification: No access to your **Tesla** account. Check your account and enter a new password in device settings.
device.errorNoTokens: The authentication system for the Tesla account has changed.  Go to Device settings - Maintenance Actions - Repair to repair.
device.errorNoTokensNotification: The authentication system for the **Tesla** account has changed.  Go to Device settings - Maintenance Actions - Repair to repair.
device.invalid_max_avail_temp: Temperature cannot be above max. allowed temperature
device.invalid_min_avail_temp: Temperature cannot be below min. allowed temperature

login.cannot_verify_mfa: Not logged in, so cannot verify MFA
